portfolio.title: Article
portfolio.description: My mission was to recreate a webisite I use on my everyday life. I built a full-stack web application with CRUD operations and PERN stack.

portfolio.title: Youtube 2.0
portfolio.description: In this project I used youtubes API to recreate a starter version of it's website with functional search box and video play.

portfolio.title: Dream Team
portfolio.description: This is a fantasy NBA website. Using the PERN stack I was able to save all teams made by the user. Data was created to hold all of the players names for selection purposes.
